title: The cop shoots a two-year-old black kid after he mistook Bavier for the gun.
subtitle: A fake story in 2015 claims that an officer in Baltimore shot and killed Malik Gibson after he missed a gun refinery that reappeared in July 2016.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A Baltimore police officer shot and killed a two-year-old Malik Gibson after he screwed up his gun lollipop.
